Language.name: en
Language.Text:
What a stench! Yuck, it makes me sick ...
It's going to be that green slime over there, I'd rather stay away from it.
I don't like it at all. And the floor, which crumbles under your feet and you cannot go back ...
Relax, we were preparing for this, we trained. And we know that each maze has a solution.
Each one?

Press ESC to return to the main menu and to restart the level. Progress will be forgotten.
Some items (e.g. stones) can be pushed.
